objects.text: Air Fryer Toaster Oven with Grill Combo

product_details.name: Nuwave Bravo XL Pro Air Fryer Toaster Oven with Grill Combo, 2025 New Ultra-Fast Convection System, 35% Crispier, 2X More Even, 142 Presets, 50-500F, Smarter Probe, PFAS Free, 30QT, Stainless Steel
product_details.description:
- Brand: Nuwave.
- Color: Brushed Stainless Steel.
- Product Dimensions: 17"D x 20.1"W x 11.1"H.
- Special Feature: 50-500, 0-100 Hours, 3 Selectable Fan Speed; Upper and Lower Heaters Adjustable From 0-100%; Carrying-over Cooking Function; Auto Preheat, Auto Shut Off; Delay and Clock Function; Mute/Unmute, Panel Lock; 5 Heavy-Duty Accessories, PFAS Free, Dishwasher-Safe; 60+ Chef-Made Recipes., 2025 Improved Ultra-fast Convection System; Linear T Air Frying Tech; True Char-Grilled Flavor; 3X Faster, 2X More Even; 35% Crispier Results, 95% Less Oil; 12 Cooking Functions, 100 Easy-Cook Presets, 30 Memory Slots; 10 Toast Settings, 5-Stage Cooking, 3 Sear Modes; 30QT XL Large Capacity, 4 Adjustable Rack;.
- Door Style: Dropdown Door.
- Model Name: Bravo XL Pro with Grill.
- Door Material Type: Tempered Glass.
- Power Source: Electric.
- Temperature Range: 50-500 Degrees Fahrenheit.
- Number of Shelves: 1.
- Size: 30QT.
- Control Type: Knob and Push Button.
- Manufacture Year: 2024.
- Item Weight: 24.5 pounds.
- Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
The banner is a vibrant and modern promotional design centered around a kitchen appliance. It features a dark, gradient geometric background with subtle orange grid lines and concentric circles adding visual depth. A prominent circular orange glow frames the centerpiece image of the product (`product_image`), enhancing focus and appeal. At the top, the bold white headline (`heading`) grabs attention, followed by a sleek orange subheading (`subheading`) that communicates secondary information. Below the product image, a white text layer (`description`) outlines key features, while a large orange price highlight (`price`) drives interest. A rectangular orange call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with contrasting black text (`cta`) invites interaction. 

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal (#2A2A2A)
- Dark Gray (#464646)
- Bright Orange (#FFA500)
- Deep Orange (#FF8C00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#1E1D25)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern stainless steel oven with vibrant, fiery visuals highlighting its cooking performance. The dominant color is a brushed metallic silver (#C0C0C0), which conveys durability and modernity. Intense bursts of golden yellow (#FFD700) and orange (#FF8C00) emanate from the food chamber, symbolizing heat, flavor, and energy. These warm tones contrast boldly against the cool blue highlights (#00BFFF) and deep black (#000000) of the control panel, ensuring a dynamic and eye-catching composition. The warm-cool contrast emphasizes functionality and power, making this palette perfect for an energetic and premium advertisement banner.
